Module Index Search

munchlax.lib.comment module¶

class munchlax.lib.comment.Comment(slack, comment, file)¶

Bases: munchlax.lib.object.Object

Represents a Slack file comment.

delete()¶

Deletes the file comment.

Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return ok.
edit(comment)¶

Edits the comment’s text to be comment.

Parameters:comment (str) – The new text string to use for the comment.
Returns:An updated version of the comment.
Return type:Comment
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return ok.
